title: Rock Lees New game mode
body:
A Summoners rift game mode.
The mode is basically like normal Summoners but with a small difference.
Only one of each fully built item can be purchased by the whole team ,IE Infinity Edge, Rabadon's Deathcap, Doran's ring and Berserker's greaves.
This game mode seems like it would be fun and would lead to a lot of teamwork.
I know the gameplay is pretty much the same but I think that it would be easy to make . 
I would love to hear your opinions and improvements thx
